definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: Update plans for the balance year, and fine-tune plans in details for the coming quarter .
sentences.chinese: 告知剩余年份的计划及下一季的详细计划。

sentences.english: Dry year is relatively common in loess region, particularly spring drought.
sentences.chinese: 黄土丘陵区干早年份较常见，春旱尤为严重。

sentences.english: Specifies how two-digit years are interpreted.
sentences.chinese: 指定如何解释两位数字的年份。

sentences.english: Natural survival rate of eggs and the various instar larvae in different years were also investigated.
sentences.chinese: 并观察了不同年份棉铃虫卵和各龄幼虫的自然存活率。

sentences.english: To those I recommend using the Deathday Cake dating.
sentences.chinese: 对于那些人，我推荐用忌辰蛋糕来推算年份。

sentences.english: These two expenditures were not incurred in the same year.
sentences.chinese: 这两笔开支不在一个年份。

sentences.english: And the champagne of choice is decidedly non-vintage.
sentences.chinese: 香槟的选择也并不依靠年份。

sentences.english: I saw that it was from a single vintage year, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 我看到标签上印有年份，这是瓶2006年的酒。

sentences.english: Rather, the years pile on like blankets, existing all at once.
sentences.chinese: 这么说吧，年份像毯子一样堆叠，相互并列同时存在。

sentences.english: This indicated that the bivoltine ecotype was dominant in Shenyang area.
sentences.chinese: 说明一般年份沈阳地区玉米螟二化性比例比一化性大。

sentences.english: There are tea collectors who always look for vintage Pu-erh made by famous factory.
sentences.chinese: 收藏人士总是热衷于寻找大厂制作的年份普洱。

sentences.english: Here's the thing: I'd like the second year always to be the current year. Listing 6 shows how you'd do this with a scriptlet
sentences.chinese: 问题在于，我希望第二个年份总是当前的年份。

sentences.english: Here's the thing: I'd like the second year always to be the current year. Listing 6 shows how you'd do this with a scriptlet
sentences.chinese: 问题在于，我希望第二个年份总是当前的年份。

sentences.english: The year 2012 is acting like a badly behaved celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 2012这个年份正像一个劣迹斑斑的名人。

sentences.english: Tales of greed and fraud during the boom years abound.
sentences.chinese: 在经济景气年份，充斥着贪婪和欺骗的故事。

sentences.english: The vintage was not good but the prices remained high.
sentences.chinese: 虽然酒的年份不佳，但是其价格始终居高不下。

definition: start of the year/whole year/a particular year/period/days/epoch/a year's harvest
relative purity of silver or gold/purity in carat weight/quality/fineness
source (of a product)/place of origin/manufacturing location
within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
year of one's birth sign, according to the cycle of 12 animals of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]
a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties)/age/era/period/CL:個|个[ge4]
reign title/era name (name for either the entire reign of an emperor or one part of it)/year number (such as 2016 or 甲子)
